    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Comment de l'huile est formée</string>
            <string language="en">How oil is formed</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie Öl gebildet wird</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como o óleo é dado forma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come l'olio è formato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς το πετρέλαιο διαμορφώνεται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo se forma el aceite</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme illustre comment l'huile est formée dû à l'application de la chaleur et à la pression des roches sur les animaux morts qui se décomposent au fond de la mer.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates how oil is formed due to the application of heat and pressure of rocks on the decaying dead animals at the bottom of the sea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">animaux morts</string>
            <string language="en">dead animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">détérioration</string>
            <string language="en">decay</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la chaleur</string>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">couches</string>
            <string language="en">layers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">boue</string>
            <string language="en">mud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">huile</string>
            <string language="en">oil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pression</string>
            <string language="en">pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roches</string>
            <string language="en">rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mers</string>
            <string language="en">seas</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, wie Öl an der 
Wärmezufuhr und am Druck der Felsen auf den toten Tieren Verfallens 
an der Unterseite des Meeres gebildetes liegt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra como o óleo é  dado forma
devido à aplicação de calor e à pressão das rochas nos animais 
inoperantes deteriorar no fundo do mar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra come l'olio è formato 
dovuto l'applicazione di calore e la pressione delle roccie sugli 
animali guasti decadere alla parte inferiore del mare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί πώς το πετρέλαιο 
διαμορφώνεται λόγω στην εφαρμογή της θερμότητας και την πίεση των
βράχων στα αποσυντιθειμένος νεκρά ζώα στο κατώτατο σημείο της 
θάλασσας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra cómo el aceite es formado 
debido a la aplicación del calor y a la presión de rocas en los 
animales muertos el decaerse en el fondo del mar.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
